title: BlockHashMissingFromExecutionLayer when querying a CL with Erigon attached
body:
#### System information

Erigon version: `erigon version 2.43.0-stable-1106475e`

OS & Version: Linux

Erigon Command (with flags/config):

```
      - erigon
      - --private.api.addr
      - 0.0.0.0:9090
      - --datadir
      - /var/lib/erigon
      - --port
      - ${EL_P2P_PORT:-30303}
      - --p2p.allowed-ports
      - ${EL_P2P_PORT:-30303},${ERIGON_P2P_PORT_2:-30304},${ERIGON_P2P_PORT_3:-30305}
      - --torrent.port
      - ${ERIGON_TORRENT_PORT:-42069}
      - --nat
      - any
      - --chain
      - ${NETWORK}
      - --log.console.verbosity
      - ${LOG_LEVEL}
      - --metrics
      - --metrics.addr
      - 0.0.0.0
      - --http
      - --http.addr
      - 0.0.0.0
      - --http.port
      - ${EL_RPC_PORT}
      - --http.vhosts=*
      - --http.corsdomain=*
      - --http.api
      - web3,eth,net,engine
      - --ws
      # Allow RocketPool >=1.9 watchtower queries
      - --rpc.returndata.limit
      - "1000000"
      - --authrpc.addr
      - 0.0.0.0
      - --authrpc.port
      - ${EE_PORT:-8551}
      - --authrpc.vhosts=*
      - --authrpc.jwtsecret
      - /var/lib/erigon/ee-secret/jwtsecret
      - --maxpeers
      - ${EL_MAX_PEER_COUNT:-100}
      # To assist with recordsize 16k in ZFS
      - --db.pagesize
      - 16K
```


Concensus Layer: `Lighthouse v4.1.0-693886b`

Concensus Layer Command (with flags/config):

```
      - lighthouse
      - bn
      - --disable-upnp
      - --datadir
      - /var/lib/lighthouse
      - --http
      - --http-address
      - 0.0.0.0
      - --http-port
      - ${CL_REST_PORT:-5052}
      - --network
      - ${NETWORK}
      - --port
      - ${CL_P2P_PORT:-9000}
      - --target-peers
      - ${CL_MAX_PEER_COUNT:-80}
      - --execution-endpoint
      - ${EL_NODE}
      - --execution-jwt
      - /var/lib/lighthouse/beacon/ee-secret/jwtsecret
      - --debug-level=${LOG_LEVEL}
      - --metrics
      - --metrics-address
      - 0.0.0.0
      - --metrics-port
      - "8008"
      - --validator-monitor-auto
      - --suggested-fee-recipient
      - ${FEE_RECIPIENT}
```

Chain/Network: mainnet

#### Actual behaviour

```
curl https://cl.example.com/eth/v2/beacon/blocks/6211679 && echo
{"code":500,"message":"UNHANDLED_ERROR: BlockHashMissingFromExecutionLayer(0x66a2a7245aad3b8249277de493909ef568353a530babc44da395687322591b4d)","stacktraces":[]}
```

#### Context

The same query against a Lighthouse connected to Nethermind succeeds. It's a Lighthouse connected to Erigon that fails.

Get same error on goerli testnet with erigon 2.42.0 and lighthouse 4.2.0
```
curl https://cl.example.com/eth/v2/beacon/blocks/5760187
{
    "code": 500,
    "message": "UNHANDLED_ERROR: BlockHashMissingFromExecutionLayer(0xea1e8ff10ac0db028d22c163faa1c8f4801326dd498b250aef7fd6734221bf21)",
    "stacktraces": []
}
```
